Class TicketMiner

java.lang.Object
TicketMiner
public class TicketMiner extends Object
The TicketMiner class manages ticket fees and revenue calculation for events.

    Method

    • getCollectedFees

    • getAllFees

      public double getAllFees(int ticketAmount, double ticketPrice)
      Calculates and returns the total fees for an event based on ticket amount and price.
      Parameters:
      ticketAmount - The number of tickets sold.
      ticketPrice - The price per ticket.
      Returns:
      The total fees (convenience, service, and charity) for the given ticket amount and price.

    • getConvenienceFee

      public double getConvenienceFee()
      Returns the convenience fee.
      Returns:
      The convenience fee.

    • getServiceFee

      public double getServiceFee(int ticketAmount, double ticketPrice)
      Calculates and returns the service fee based on the number of tickets and ticket price.
      Parameters:
      ticketAmount - The number of tickets.
      ticketPrice - The price per ticket.
      Returns:
      The service fee.

    • getCharityFee

      public double getCharityFee(int ticketAmount, double ticketPrice)
      Calculates and returns the charity fee based on the number of tickets and ticket price.
      Parameters:
      ticketAmount - The number of tickets.
      ticketPrice - The price per ticket.
      Returns:
      The charity fee.

    • initializeCollectedFees

      public void initializeCollectedFees(LinkedHashMap<Integer,Event> eventMap)
      Initializes the collected fees for each event. If the eventId's inner HashMap doesn't exist, it creates a new one and initializes specific fee types for the eventId.

    • updateConvenienceFees

      public void updateConvenienceFees(int eventId)
      Updates the convenience fees for a specific event based on the convenience fee value.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • updateServiceFees

      eventId - The ID of the event.
